meanings.sent1: She enjoys sipping tea in the morning.
meanings.sent2: He was sipping his juice slowly.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked like it was sipping from an invisible cup.
meanings.sent4: The sun was sipping the last drops of daylight.
meanings.sent5: The sound of sipping water echoed in the quiet room.

meanings.definition: The action of drinking by taking small mouthfuls.
meanings.sent1: Her sipping of the soda was gentle.
meanings.sent2: The sipping of the wine was elegant.
meanings.sent3: The sipping of the soup seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent4: The sipping of the river by the thirsty deer was peaceful.
meanings.sent5: The sipping of the hot cocoa warmed her heart.
